title: 4 ex diamonds looking for 5th jg/sup to flex with
body: Hey, looking for a 5th jg or sup to play flex and maybe some ool later, looking for plat player as we have all taken breaks and are not as good as we used to be, HMU on e z or boatymcboatface. Have Mic and discord and not be to serious

replies.body: I've added you in game Silver 1 Support main!
mate you know you are hated right?
ill add u tomorrow plat5/4 bounce between the 2 support main

Add me ExodusXOmega
Can pretty much fill any lane required
Hi, I'm a bronze 5 support main. I am really good though, I am just held back by my teammates. I quite honestly deserve challenjour so pick me please. (pay no note to my 300mmr).

I lol'ed :)

Btw, not a bad winrate on Janna, but your KDA could do with some work ;)

> [{quoted}](name=Main Line,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=xuxWWyVE,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-07-12T13:09:40.170+0000)
>
> I lol'ed :)
> 
> Btw, not a bad winrate on Janna, but your KDA could do with some work ;)

:P I was just mocking those guys haha. I have only just gotten back into LoL so I'm not so good lol.
Silver supp here but i am good enough to go pro for sure. I just get bad teams.
